name: One Guy With Two Tasks
description:
One Guy With Two Tasks is a jam game made by a 14 year old. So dont expect much!

The game is about vacuuming the rooms and loading the dishwasher. Every hausekeeper has different commands. Your goal is to remember them and do the job! 

Controls:

Arrows --> Move

Space --> Interact (You problaby wont need it)

Left Shift--> Run vacuum

z-s-v--> Choose dishwasher pattern (While touching dishwasher)

Unfortunately the music does not work due to a problem with the engine.  I included the file separately if you really want to hear it. Please comment if you know how to fix it. I am using Gdevelop and the music runs on the preview but not on the standalone version.

I used assets from the internet for the character, fonts and the music (that does not work) Thanks to:

-Aleifr/Gravity

-Fanto8BC

-I downloaded the font a long time ago so I dont remember where I got it. If it belongs to you please contact me.

Have fun!
